txt.en: 'Moria has two factions: The Iron Garrison Miners and the Iron Garrison Guards. Each offers their own unique rewards, and each favours their own trinkets and relics that can be collected throughout Moria.\n\nAs you complete quests in Moria's many levels, one faction or another will favour you. Be sure to check back with the vendors as you grow friendlier with the Iron Garrison!'
